name: Cartoon Ninja Character Pack
description:
Contains the following animations : 

  • Attack 01
  • Attack 02
  • Death
  • IdleKatanaPose01
  • IdlePose01
  • IdlePose02
  • Pose01ToPose02
  • RunKatanaPose01
  • RunPose01
  • RunPose02
  • TakeDamagePose01
  • TakeDamagePose02
  • TakeKatanawSlice

Each animation is drawn with and without black outline.

A total of 236 frames drawn on a 64 x 64 canvas. 

You can use this asset in any project you want, commercial or not.

(if you want my skills in any of your project, do not hesitate to ask !)
